string.text: Get Next Task
Receive your next task.
You must meet with one of the Monolith elders. Go to him now.
Good luck.
Destroy the Non-Believers
Lead the Monolith attack against the infidels. The lead time is 6 hours.
The time has come, my son. You must lead your brothers into battle. Fight fiecely and accept no surrender. Defeat the infidels for the good of the Monolith, so you have a quarter day.
You are a worthy warrior of the Monolith. Accept this gift on His behalf:
Collect %s for Monolith
Preacher has asked me to bring him %s.
My son, your brothers need for you to collect provisions.
{item_name} - get it for the benefit of us. I give you three days to search. Let the Monolith show you the way.
This will benefit all of us, for the protection of the Almighty. I thank you. Accept these gifts:
Venture into the Zone
You must prove your worth by surviving a journey into the Zone.

My son, you must prove yourself to the almighty Monolith. You must travel alone deep into the Zone. Face all challenges that confront you. Destroy all enemies you encounter. Do this for the good of the Monolith.
You have done well, my son.
Get Next Task
Receive your next task.
My son, you serve the Monolith well. Speak with one of the elders and ask what you may do to further help our great cause.
Good luck.
Recover Stolen Monolith Equipment
A stalker has sabotaged the Brain Scorcher. Recover the equipment he removed. The lead time is 2 days.
A stalker has stolen a vital piece of equipment from the Brain Scorcher. You must recover it for the good of the almighty Monolith. You have two days.
You have done well.
Hunt for Food
Lead a hunt into the Zone to harvest meat for your Monolith brothers. The lead time is one day.
We must replenish our food supplies. Need to go hunting. Go, but they should be here in a day.
You have all served the Monolith well. The meat you have brought will be served at tonights feast. As your reward, we will reserve the eyeballs for you.
%s - bring it to Father Diodor
We need to get Father Diodore these weapons to strengthen the Monolith arsenal. It's a six-day runtime.
We must have a powerful arsenal to achieve our glorious goals.
{item_name} is what we need. The success of this mission will largely serve the Monolith cause. It should be here in six days, go.
You have done well, my son.
Relinquish Payment to Join Monolith
You are to become Monolith, you will have no more need for money. Give Preacher 1,000 UAH to let you join the almighty Monolith.
It's good you have come to your senses, my child. We will welcome you into the order of the Monolith but you must first relinquish all of your worldly possessions in the form of 1,000 UAH.
Good. Welcome to the brotherhood of the Monolith.
Conquer the Enemy
You have been tasked to clear an area for the good of the almighty Monolith. Report back to Preacher after the job is done. The time of execution is 24 hours.
I have an important mission for you, brother. You must destroy the infidel camp so that our brothers can establish themselves in this place. I will give you 24 hours. Are you ready?
The task is done? Good. Praise Monolith.
Kill the Planner
A stalker is trying to deactivate the Brain Scorcher. Kill him. Time of execution - 3 days

There are many threats to the great works of the Zone. There is one who is once again planning to deactivate the Brain Scorcher. He must be stopped. You must find him and destroy him. I give you 3 days.
You have done well. The Collective is pleased.
Find a %s for Preacher
Preacher has requested a new rifle to add to the Monolith arsenal.
We grow more powerful every day. We need more weaponry to continue to achieve our goals. You must find a new weapon for us so we may continue to grow our arsenal.
Find a new {item_name} and bring it to me.
This will do well.
Hunt for %s for Preacher
Hunt for and field dress %s. Return the meat to Preacher so he may prepare it. The execution time is 3 days.
Our provisions run low. You must go out into the Zone and hunt for meat so that your Monolith brothers may feast.
Hunt for and bring us {item_name}. Remember these creatures are a gift of the Zone. Kill them swiftly and give thanks. Return the meat to me when you have succeeded. I expect them in 3 days.
You have succeeded in your task. Well done.
Collect %s for Preacher
Find %s and return to the Preacher. The execution time is 3 days.
You must procure more supplies for us so we may continue our great works.
You must provide more supplies for us so that we can continue our great works. Get there {item_name} and come back. I give you three days to search.
You have done well to serve Monolith.
Find the %s Artefact for Preacher
Find the %s artefact. Bring it back to Preacher so he may prepare it as an offering.
We must find another artifact to give as an offering. Will you help serve the good of the Monolith?
Find a {item_name}. Bring it to me when you have succeeded so we may conduct the ceremony.
You serve the Monolith well. Join us tonight in the ceremonial offering. There will be chanting.
Find %s for Cleric
%s are required by Cleric to install basic equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
I need you to do something for me. I need specific tools to tune our weapons.
Okay, I need a {item_name}. Go, now.
You've done well.
Find %s for Cleric
%s are required by Cleric to install advanced equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
I need some more tools; better tools. Can you find what I ask, again?
I need a set of advanced tools. It should contain what I need. If you can bring some back for me I will be grateful, I will even offer you a discount from here on out.
Good. You've brought them to me.
Find %s for Cleric
%s are required by Cleric to install expert equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.
I need some more tools; better tools. Can you find what I ask, again?
I need a set of expert tools. It should contain what I need. If you can bring some back for me I will be grateful, I will even offer you a discount from here on out.
Good. You've brought them to me.
